label: clinical_signal_03_dx_pain_management_trial_009
content:
## 2024-04-29 Daily Operations Summary

### Enrollment
- Total Enrolled: 91
- Active: 87
- Screen Failures Cumulative: 25
- Withdrawals Cumulative: 4

### Enrollment By Treatment Arm
- Multimodal: 29
- Standard: 31
- Placebo: 31

### Efficacy By Arm
- Multimodal VAS Pain Score Mean: 5.7
- Multimodal VAS Pain Score SD: 1.0
- Multimodal Morphine Equivalents (mg) Mean: 38.5
- Multimodal Morphine Equivalents (mg) SD: 6.5
- Multimodal Six MWT (meters) Mean: 320.0
- Multimodal Six MWT (meters) SD: 30.0
- Multimodal Grip Strength (kg) Mean: 24.1
- Multimodal Grip Strength (kg) SD: 3.8
- Multimodal Sleep Quality Index Mean: 5.1
- Multimodal Sleep Quality Index SD: 1.4
- Multimodal Rescue Med Doses per Week Mean: 3.6
- Multimodal Rescue Med Doses per Week SD: 2.3

- Standard VAS Pain Score Mean: 6.4
- Standard VAS Pain Score SD: 1.5
- Standard Morphine Equivalents (mg) Mean: 45.0
- Standard Morphine Equivalents (mg) SD: 5.8
- Standard Six MWT (meters) Mean: 292.0
- Standard Six MWT (meters) SD: 42.0
- Standard Grip Strength (kg) Mean: 21.5
- Standard Grip Strength (kg) SD: 4.9
- Standard Sleep Quality Index Mean: 4.3
- Standard Sleep Quality Index SD: 1.3
- Standard Rescue Med Doses per Week Mean: 5.7
- Standard Rescue Med Doses per Week SD: 2.0

- Placebo VAS Pain Score Mean: 6.9
- Placebo VAS Pain Score SD: 1.9
- Placebo Morphine Equivalents (mg) Mean: 48.1
- Placebo Morphine Equivalents (mg) SD: 5.9
- Placebo Six MWT (meters) Mean: 260.0
- Placebo Six MWT (meters) SD: 45.0
- Placebo Grip Strength (kg) Mean: 19.6
- Placebo Grip Strength (kg) SD: 4.7
- Placebo Sleep Quality Index Mean: 3.9
- Placebo Sleep Quality Index SD: 1.3
- Placebo Rescue Med Doses per Week Mean: 6.4
- Placebo Rescue Med Doses per Week SD: 1.8

### Physical Therapy
- Sessions Scheduled: 177
- Sessions Attended: 158
- Attendance Rate (%): 85.6

### Safety Labs
- Hemoglobin (g/dL) Mean: 14.5
- Hemoglobin (g/dL) SD: 1.3
- WBC (K) Mean: 6.4
- WBC (K) SD: 1.3
- Platelets (K) Mean: 250
- Platelets (K) SD: 48
- Serum Creatinine (mg/dL) Mean: 1.09
- Serum Creatinine (mg/dL) SD: 0.13
- Blood Glucose (mg/dL) Mean: 107.0
- Blood Glucose (mg/dL) SD: 16.0
- ESR (mm/hr) Mean: 10.0
- ESR (mm/hr) SD: 4.0

### Adverse Events
- AE ID: PM-AE-0977, Description: nausea, Grade: 1, Relatedness: possibly related, Resolved: false, Treatment Arm: standard
- AE ID: PM-AE-0919, Description: insomnia, Grade: 1, Relatedness: probably related, Resolved: true, Treatment Arm: standard
- AE ID: PM-AE-0912, Description: pruritus, Grade: 2, Relatedness: unlikely related, Resolved: true, Treatment Arm: standard
- AE ID: PM-AE-0969, Description: constipation, Grade: 1, Relatedness: possibly related, Resolved: true, Treatment Arm: multimodal

### Protocol Deviations
- PD ID: PM-PD-0948, Description: Sleep diary not returned by subject, Severity: minor

### Events
- Site 07 monitoring visit completed, 2 findings
- Blinded interim efficacy data compiled for DSMB
- Rescue medication supply restocked at 30 sites

### Notes
- Week 9: Pain management assessments on track. 91 subjects enrolled across treatment arms. Functional outcomes within expected ranges.
